attributes.action: Take out the bangs/noise out of fireworks
attributes.additional_details: It's not fair on the elderly, animals or the people who work nights. It causes panic, stress, anxiety & sometimes death.
attributes.background: I would like you to consider the noise, loud bangs that fireworks make, I'm not asking you do ban them just to make them noise free, speak to the manufacturer.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758
